# Tutorials

[Survival analysis in R](survival-analysis-in-r.qmd): A detailed tutorial on conducting survival analyses in R, including an introduction to the basics of survival analysis, landmark analyses and time-dependent covariates, competing risks, and a selection of advanced topics.

# Courses

[R for Cleveland Clinic Molecular Medicine PhD program](https://www.emilyzabor.com/mmedr/): Five one-hour sessions on the basics of R, followed by two two-hour sessions introducing biostatistics and epidemiology methods in R.
